password.breaches: Your password has appeared in {count, plural, one {a data breach} other {{count} data breaches}}. While our systems remain secure, we recommend updating your password immediately as a precaution.{otp, select, true {} other { You should also enable 2-factor authentication for added security.}} <guide>Learn more</guide>.
password.description1: Your password is the first line of defense against unauthorized access to your account.
password.description2: Choose a strong password, don't share it for other services or with other people. Read our guide to choosing and managing a secure password.
password.label: New password

score.breached: is in a data breach. Try a different one?

password.title: Password
password.updateNotice: For security reasons, changing your password signs you out everywhere else.
password.updateSuggestion: Use at least 10 characters. Avoid common or obvious words like pet names, sports teams, or birthdays.

summary.breaches: The password you use has appeared in data breaches.
